content.rendered:
Directed by Farhad Samji

Written by Tasha Bhambra. Sara Bodinar. Aakash Kaushik. Sajid Khan. Sparsh Khetarpal. Sajid Nadiadwala

Cast Akshay Kumar (Prince Bala Dev Singh / Harry). Riteish Deshmukh (Bangdu Maharaj / Roy). Bobby Deol (Dharamputra / Max). Kriti Sanon (Princes Madhu / Kriti). Pooja Hegde (Princes Mala / Pooja). Kriti Kharbanda (Princes Meena / Neha). Rana Daggubati (Raja Gama / Pappu Rangeela). Sharad Kelkar (Suryabhan / Michael Bhai). Chunky Pandey (Pehla Pasta / Akhri Pasta). Johny Lever (Winston Churchgate / Gigli (as Johnny Lever)). Jamie Lever (Gigli). Ranjeet Bedi (King of Sitamgarh / Thakral (as Ranjeet)). Aakash Dabhade (Rahul (Harry’s friend in London)). Saurabh Sachdeva (Raazdar) . Cain Aiden (Party Guest).Sayed Aarish Ali. Gursharn Arya (Pasta brother). Ro Ashika (Royalist at palace). Dev Barot (Dancer). Mohit Chhabra (London Boy). Christian Di Sciullo (Bodyguard). Elena Roxana Maria Fernandes (Ranjeet’s Girlfriend).Sougata Ghosh. Sonia Goswami (Royalist at Palace). Sammy Jonas Heaney (Samuel Jonas (as Sammy John Heaney)). Peter Jay (Royalist at Palace). Gurnita Kaur Kahlon (Royalist Flag Waver). Perrie Kapernaros (Girlfriend King of Sitamgarh / Thakral). Vaunisha Kapoor (Royalist at Palace). Vital Karia (Royalist at Palace). Leysan Karimova (Ranjeet’s Girlfriend). Chris Katako (Royalist at Palace). Jessie Jane Knowles (Girlfriend). Mervi Koski (Royalist at Palace). Dimple Kumar (Royalist at Palace).Chandramogli Madem. Shyam Mashalkar (Darbari). Sunit Morarjee (Naama khookha). Kuldeep N.(Royalist at Palace). Sam Nagar (Background Dancer). NarayanGhimire (Teacher). Victor Nita (Royal Palace Guard). Nutan (Dancer). Komal Padwal (Royalist at Palace). Manoj Pahwa (Big Bhai).Nana Patekar.Vishal Meena Phagi. The Phoenix Pipes & Drums (Pipe Band). Archana Puran Singh (Harry Max and Roy’s Mother). Jim Quirke (Royalist at Palace). Zoha Rahman (Wedding Guest). Chloe Rann (Girlfriend). Karl-Martin Rantapelkonen (Gang member). Royal British Legion Band & Corps of Drums Romford (British Military Marching Band). Parikshit Sahni (Bala’s Father). Joanna Shegera (Royalist at Palace). Dipesh K. Shrestha (Bhai). Umang Dev Shukla (Rana ji ka Bhai (voice)). Nawazuddin Siddiqui (Baba Ramsey). Deependra Singh (Manya). Skaterrboyy20(Rohit maan). Priya Tailor (Royalist at Palace). Martha Taylor (Dancer). Girish Thapar (Raj purohit). Guru Saran Tiwari (Royal Guard (as Saran Tiwari)). Samantha Sharon Watson (Event attendee). Victoria Rose Wilson (Dancer). Monica Wong(Royalist at Palace). Mubarak Zeb (Royalist at Palace). Prithvi Zutshi (Siskeria). Shakti Kapoor (Mr. Sinha (Harry, Max & Roy’s father) (uncredited)). Preeti Malhotra (Flag waving (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Harish Iyer. Hetvi Karia. Firuzi Khan. Manoj Mittra. Sajid Nadiadwala. Rajeev Neelakanta. Yogiraj Shetty. Ssunny Suraani

Production Apple & Mango Picture. Fox STAR Studio. NNB Digital Medi
